name: Hair Makeover
description:
Everybody has a bad hair day sometimes. If you don’t want the hair out of place, train in our new hair salon to learn all the secrets for achieving shiny hair.

4 models are waiting for your hairstylist skills. Offer them basic hair care and haircut, as well as perfect final look. Start by washing your model’s hair with a foamy shampoo and water. Then dry it with a towel or a hair dryer. Continue combing, cutting or shaving.

If you cut off too much hair, magic elixir can always help you grow it back. Create any look you want, using an iron, hair curler or curling iron. You can also color the new hairstyles with various sprays. Finally, choose some cool eyewear to achieve a trendy look.

Follow the fashion trends and create a funky hair makeover. Let the fun begin!

Features:
• creative game for girls and boys
• simple gameplay without rules
• 4 models (3 girls and 1 boy) with interesting face expressions
• professional hairdresser's tools
• tons of cool colors
• different sunglasses and eyeglasses

FOR PARENTS
This game is free to play but certain in-game items may require payment via in-app purchase. Please check your device settings for more detailed parental options regarding in-app purchases.
The game contains advertising for Bubadu’s products or some third parties which will redirect users to our sites, apps or third-party sites.
